title: Security Controls
description: Questions about different types of security controls and their implementation

questions.question: Which type of security control is designed to deter potential attackers?
questions.explanation: Deterrent controls are designed to discourage potential attackers from attempting malicious activities by making them aware that security measures are in place.

questions.question: What is an example of a compensating control?
questions.explanation: Compensating controls provide alternative protection when primary controls cannot be implemented or have failed.
